text: There's a lot of time consuming and tedious work at every stage
of machine learning development. Amazon SageMaker wants
to change the game. Introducing the
next generation SageMaker notebooks. Designed
to help simplify data preparation, improve collaboration,
and automate deployment.
Today, teams spend months writing boilerplate code
to visualize and analyze different parts of their
data set.  With a new built-in data preparation capability,
powered by SageMaker Data Rrangler, you
can visualize your data, detect quality issues, receive
suggestions, and fix the issues in
a few clicks - directly in the notebook.
Want a better way to collaborate? Create shared spaces
in Amazon SageMaker.
So your team can simultaneously organize, share, and
collaborate on resources. Now, you can iterate faster
by editing, executing, and reviewing
outputs of the same notebooks together in real time.
All resources created in the shared
spaces are automatically tagged, making it easier
for business leaders and platform administrators to monitor
costs and plan budgets.
Moving notebook code into production is a
manual process that can take weeks just to set
up infrastructure. But now, you can select a notebook
and automate it as a job that can run in a production environment
in few clicks. With a complete
view of all scheduled notebook jobs, it's easy to pause, resume,
or update schedules as needed.
Simplify data preparation, collaborate in
real time, and automatically convert notebook code
into production-ready jobs, with Amazon SageMaker's
studio notebooks.
